post: WATCH LIVE Richard Branson and crew of mission specialists fly to space on Virgin Galactic‚Äôs A new space age is here

It‚Äôs a beautiful day to go to space Richard Branson and the crew have arrived at Spaceport America in New Mexico Get ready to watch our test flight LIVE at 7 30 am PT 10 30 am ET 3 30 pm BST on www virgingalactic com

NEW TIME Watch launch and livestream TODAY at 7 30 am PT 10 30 am ET 3 30 pm BST Good morning from Spaceport America in New Mexico Overnight weather delayed the start of flight preparations but we are on track to fly today with a newly scheduled time WATCH www virgingalactic com

Wake up and watch the launch of the next space age Our crew of mission specialists including Richard Branson are just hours away from our test flight launch Watch live tomorrow at 8 30 am PT 10 30 am ET 3 30pm BST on www virgingalactic com

From Richard Branson s dream to reality this is the story of Virgin Galactic Imagine what greatness can come from the next generation of dreamers Watch the launch live tomorrow at 6 am PT 9 am ET 2 pm BST on www virgingalactic com

2 days until There‚Äôs space for all so we invited a few special guests to join our global livestream Stephen Colbert Khalid Col Chris Hadfield and Kellie Gerardi Watch the launch live this Sunday at 6 am PT 9 am ET 2 pm BST on
3 days until Come inside the hangar for pre flight preparations as our spaceship VSS Unity joins forces with our mothership VMS Eve Watch the launch live this Sunday at 6 am PT 9 am ET 2 pm BST
Stephen Colbert is in are you Join us and livestream host Stephen Colbert this Sunday at 6 am PT 9 am ET 2 pm GST WATCH LIVE Virgin Galactic Unity 22 Spaceflight Livestream on www virgingalactic com

Join us July 11th for our first fully crewed rocket powered test flight and the beginning of a new space age Aboard will be our team of two pilots and four mission specialists including Sir Richard Branson They will put our Future Astronaut spaceflight experience to a final test while giving the world a preview of the life changing experience

It‚Äôs our honor to introduce Sirisha Bandla Colin Bennett and Beth Moses as the crew joining Richard Branson on our test flight We sat down with each of them to explore their unique backgrounds roles for the mission and what the next era of space travel means for the world Watch the flight live this Sunday here

There is nothing more uplifting than a hug from zero gravity Adam King a 6 year old boy from Ireland flew a special heart shaped message on our recent spaceflight Adam who loves space and dreams of becoming a CAPCOM in Mission Control wanted to fly his virtual hug to space so that he could ‚Äúwrap a hug around the world‚Äù and encourage people to connect with each other He continues to inspire thousands around the world with his story and movement It was our honor to fly your message to space Adam ‚Äì it got quite the view

Meet Kellie Gerardi bioastronautics researcher mother science communicator commercial spaceflight advocate and payload specialist Kellie is set to fly on a dedicated research mission during which she will conduct experiments and test new healthcare technologies on behalf of the International Institute of Astronautical Sciences IIAS Learn more about Kellie‚Äôs work and lifelong passion for democratizing access to space here
Boundless beauty awaits
Imagine in all its glory üöÄ
Leave a ‚ù§Ô∏è if you love the look of Imagine
We‚Äôre struggling to pick our favorite image Help us out Imagine
We celebrate the life and achievements of Apollo 11 astronaut Michael Collins In 1969 Michael Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin ignited a passion for human space travel which we still feel to this day

VMS Eve returns to the skies above Spaceport America This flight tested an upgrade that will further improve the performance of our mothership during its smooth climb to release altitude Pilots were Nicola Pecile and Mark Stucky also onboard was Flight Test Engineer Jake Varhus

We asked Virgin Galactic Chief Astronaut Instructor and the world‚Äôs first female commercial astronaut Beth Moses for her thoughts on the evolution of the space industry This picture was taken when she flew into space on our second spaceflight Happy Sixty years ago today Yuri Gagarin became the first human to travel into space Read Beth‚Äôs blog
The Future of the Fleet Rollout March 30th

Virgin Galactic announces fourth quarter and full year 2020 financial results Key updates below Rollout of second spaceship scheduled to take place on March 30th Next rocket powered spaceflight targeted to occur in May Announced expected timing of revenue generating flight with the Italian Air Force Read the full announcement here

Virgin Galactic announces legendary former Disney Imagineer Joe Rohde as Experience Architect He will help design and guide the overall experience journey for future astronauts friends and family and inspired fans alike
Space is too good not to share Our proof is in the incredible views of Earth aboard See more from the spaceflight
Today‚Äôs view Infinite made a beautiful ascent to apogee over Spaceport America New Mexico virg in ZLsU
It s a beautiful day for space

Introducing Virgin Galactic Astronaut 001‚Ä¶ Join us July 11th for the start of a new space age Aboard the first fully crewed rocket powered test flight our team of two pilots and four mission specialists including Richard Branson will put our Future Astronaut spaceflight experience to a final test while giving the world a preview of the life changing experience Be part of this historic moment by watching LIVE on www virgingalactic com and our social media channels The countdown begins
